metadata.description:
Clara has a love that runs deep for Johnnie and Fred, and some days, keeping the peace between them is all she can do. But her beautiful, gentle nature is the glue that keeps her family together and strong. 

{Series 1: 1927} features 7 characters from our audio-narrative, radio play, “Johnnie’s Song”, airing fall of 2022 on Spotify and YouTube.
metadata.name: ERALôR Series 1 - #1
